name: Space Waves (itch)
description:
An endless 2D space based bullet hell with some unique features. Space Waves gets more difficult and more interesting the longer you play, more enemy types, events, and items will appear the longer you play.

This game is a work in progress, and made by a team of me alone, and although I fix any bugs I know about immediately, I am still only one person, so I might miss a few.

SFX are a current work in progress and will be added soon, with proper volume options.

More features, enemies, and items are to be added relatively frequently, about every 1-2 weeks.
